thread.title: The Fuel Powering Corporate America: $2.4 Trillion in Private Fundraising

author: Jean Eaglesham
title: The Fuel Powering Corporate America: $2.4 Trillion in Private Fundraising
text:
When the messaging app Telegram set out to raise billions of dollars this year for a project to launch a cryptocurrency, it shunned the stock market and instead invited a select group of firms to invest in its virtual coins.
These investors would be backing a project yet to be built. Little was known about the private companyâ€™s ownership or finances. Even so, 81 investors stepped forward to pour in $850 million, with other financing rounds still to come.
